title: Bonus Episode 7 - The Investigators on iTunes
description:
A bonus clip featuring Wil Wheaton from our new live recording, The Investigators.

The full album available for sale now on iTunes at https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/the-investigators-live/id1118089519 and still available at [nightvale.bandcamp.com](nightvale.bandcamp.com).

More Info: welcometonightvale.com. Click on Live Shows for US and Europe Tour dates. You can also join our email list there if you like emails and lists.

Follow @NightValeRadio on Twitter or Facebook to stay up to date on news and weird jokes.
